website_summaries.verdict: The advanced cameras of the iPhone 11 Pro Max make it a must-have for digital photographers.
cons: It should not be a surprise that Apple’s best iPhone is a pricy one

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful, it was cool for a few hours until the screen was completely unresponsive. Honestly I’ve bought refurbished phones before by Apple but these Amazon guys seem to really be dropping the ball. This is a terrible product and honestly now I just want my money back. Will not be purchasing any phones off Amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Good costumer service.
customer_reviews.text: While I had to return the phone since it did not work as expected. I found that their costumer service was very approachable, and understanding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with short battery life!
customer_reviews.text: quality is very good overall. Batter life is not what it should be!
customer_reviews.author: Judith Runyon

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It looks and functions like new. This is the second item that I have purchased with this seller and both have been excellent! The phone charger that came with this was NOT a type c to lightning, but I have plenty. I wasn’t very happy that it didn’t come with the headphones or the correct charger but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: iPhone Pro Max - Midnight Green
customer_reviews.text: No way was this a "Renewed" Phone - the packaging was superb - the iPhone was BETTER than description in that it appeared new - it's only been a few days, but after 6 months of Samsung Galaxay Note 10s I am back to over 20 plus years to Apple! I am in love with my new bff! Easy to set up and to use - my last iPhone was a 6X Plus so over the years, I never had a problem with it...long story why I switched but needless to say - once an iPhone always an iPhone!
customer_reviews.author: Marie J Seefeldt

customer_reviews.title: Pro max
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Have not fully used as of yet. Still learning how to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dee B.

customer_reviews.title: I got what i paid for
customer_reviews.text: 2 months in... so far so good. Battery capacity was at 100% when I received it. It came with a protective screen on it. Upon taking it off for a more durable screen protector I noticed there were scratches. HMMM... wasn’t too happy about that. But I did save $$$ of dollars buying this renewed. I’ll take what I can get. Scratched are completely unnoticeable when protection screen is on. Woohoo!! Camera game has totally upgraded. 4K videos are poppin! I was able to send high quality interview videos and create great group project videos.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase from Amazon- returned and purchased from apple store app
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to save a buck so i bought from here refurb, item came with a scuff -no biggie. when i called verizon to register the esim they told me there no such thing as that imei -so dual coverage is out of the question. thats not a scuff -its a missing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Not to happy.
customer_reviews.text: I’m mainly upset they took all the original accessories that come with the device especially at how much they are asking for. Could have gotten one brand new with all the accessories for about the same price.
customer_reviews.author: MyWifeN4Kidz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome phone and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Perfect value for money. Why buy brand new? I always get refurbished and love them. The seller was great and super responsive.
customer_reviews.author: jada cronan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I Absolutely love this phone it was everything that I thought it would be and I will definitely order again from this company and once again thanks a lot for my order it got to me when it was supposed to it was nothing damage or anything wrote the phone I am absolutely excited about this product
customer_reviews.author: contessa culbreath

customer_reviews.title: Buggy, lags a lot , slow
customer_reviews.text: It was good at starting but this product is buggy. And laggy. Slow and unresponsive. Takes time for airpods to connects since there is an issue with the product. I am not happy with this purchase. I understand it’s refurbished but that doesn’t mean you can cheat the customer.
customer_reviews.author: Dhaivat Raval

customer_reviews.title: one of the camera not working good
customer_reviews.text: camera issues on I phone 11 pro max one of the camera has line and scratch on the face you cored with callas for pretention I couldn't see the scratch for the price I paid not worded
customer_reviews.author: ali  s mousavi

customer_reviews.title: I would buy from them again
customer_reviews.text: It was as promised no flaws no blemishes , it was a terrific experience
customer_reviews.author: scott spieler

customer_reviews.title: Wasted my money phone doesn’t work well
customer_reviews.text: After 5 mins during a phone call the person on other end stops hearing me. I have to Hang up and call back
customer_reviews.author: wendell s.

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good dealer and product
customer_reviews.text: Smartphone as a new one, and all the features works perfectly!!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Ivan Franco Florez

customer_reviews.title: Dead camera
customer_reviews.text: This iPhone camera is not even working!!! everything else works ig.
customer_reviews.author: Riya K.

customer_reviews.title: the cell phone is switching off at least 3 times a day.  I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: the cell phone is switching off at least 3 times a day. I am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Gilmara santos

customer_reviews.title: Very shady
customer_reviews.text: I took my phone to ATT and was informed that the phone was not “fully unlocked” thee was no phone number, email address on any of the packaging/ literature to contact blue sky. Very shady
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: Charger is not in good shape
customer_reviews.text: The phone is so nice but I got the charger with poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Prem Addada

customer_reviews.title: Not to buy from someone’s you don’t know!
customer_reviews.text: What I don’t like is “reported stolen after a week of used and it’s locked “
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: This phone is of great quality. Can't wait for iOS 14 to debut!
customer_reviews.author: Chidubem Oparaoji

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Wasent sure about spending 1100 on renewed iPhone I'm very impressed 😀
customer_reviews.author: Daryl staples

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Arrive late and the box was open and no ear pod
customer_reviews.author: OVIDIO SEBASTIAN

customer_reviews.title: In general I am satisfied with the purchase came as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Impeccable phone, very well packaged but the charger was not 18V.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo S.

customer_reviews.title: Hi
customer_reviews.text: Untill now everything ok, i try to know more inside it
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am pleased with my purchase. I just received the phone today, and I couldn’t even tell that it was refurbished (even though it is). My package contained the phone itself and what I think is the original charger. Some people complained about receiving cheap chargers with their orders, but that was not the case with my order. It looks brand new and works as it should. The phone was also shipped very quickly, which was greatly appreciated. I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Guy1

customer_reviews.title: It’s not new
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this brand new... but it was totally used. Scratch on the screen and the old owner left the screen protector On it
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Stuck
customer_reviews.text: Probably should’ve returned it’s phone. The only reason I kept it, it was an 11 Pro Max, 256 gig. It doesn’t look like it’s Forest green, I believe it is black. The front Faze glass is broken. The phone does function correctly, or it would’ve been returned. Pretty much dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick C.

customer_reviews.title: Dent on the phone
customer_reviews.text: I like to give a 3 stars review because when I got it it has a dented on both side on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry He

customer_reviews.title: Phone doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The phone isn’t working Going to get a return order today
customer_reviews.author: Rod Davis

customer_reviews.title: Apple has lost the mojo
customer_reviews.text: I bought it brand new and the phone died after 4 months (we're talking about a phone thats worth more than a $1,000). Lost all the info and images. Took it to Apple, they "fixed" it and returned after several days. The fixed phone lasted only 2 months and started restarting non-stop. Will never buy an Apple product again. Read on the internet, there millions of people complaining about Apple products.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Problem with IPhone 11 Pro, Max
customer_reviews.text: The screen suddenly magnifies to a point you are not able to even turn it off for a reset. The screen freezes and will not allow any movement to clear the screen and return to the usable screen one to open another app. This requires that you try and turn the phone off to hopefully re-set itself but the screen is magnified so large that turn the turn off slide is barely visible by one of it's edges. FRUSTRATING !
customer_reviews.author: Hugh huff

customer_reviews.title: Buying the Phone
customer_reviews.text: I bought the phone from apple, it was more expensive, but it came with warranty. I would recommend to upgrade if you have the money to spare, but if you have the iPhone x or newer is not worth it as you will not feel much difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jefrey Arias

customer_reviews.title: Worst Experience On Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Worst Amazon Experience till date with a third party seller. BuySRY is the name i think. JUST DON'T BUY THIS. You'll regret it. The item is defective and the seller will promise you resolutions after proof only to deny you everything. Horrible experience and i hope no one has to go through the same thing again. Poor communication by the seller and Amazon reps also led to more hassle. Had to get a resolution from the executive team who were very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Rawad Akhand

customer_reviews.title: It is so incredibly amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is the best thing ever I need a nother one for free please.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Brillant and overpriced phone
customer_reviews.text: The only fault with these phones is the price. Apple gouges! It is a great phone and takes amazing pictures. The upgrade from my 6S+ is remarkable. Still, it took me over a year to work up the nerve to stomach the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tom.d'Frog

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away!
customer_reviews.text: Called carrier to activate and they said the phone is flagged as stolen. Ridiculous! This was a Christmas present to my wife
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lanier

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Worth every penny and picture quality is amazing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Natesha Jones

product_meta.title: Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max, 256GB, Midnight Green, Fully Unlocked (Renewed)
product_meta.description: Color:Midnight| Size:256GB| Style:Fully UnlockedShoot amazing videos and photos with the Ultra Wide, Wide, and Telephoto cameras. Capture your best low-light photos with Night mode. Watch HDR movies and shows on the 6.5-inch Super Retina XDR display – the brightest iPhone display yet. Experience unprecedented performance with A13 Bionic for gaming, augmented reality (AR), and photography. And get all-day battery life and a new level of water resistance. All in the first iPhone powerful enough to be called Pro. What's Included Apple iPhone 11 Pro Max 64GB EarPods with Lightning connector USB-C to Lightning cable 18W USB-C power adapter Documentation
feature_bullets: Fully unlocked and compatible with any carrier of choice (e.g. AT&T, T-Mobile, Sprint, Verizon, US-Cellular, Cricket, Metro, etc.).
The device does not come with headphones or a SIM card. It does include a charger and charging cable that may be generic, in which case it will be UL or Mfi (Made for iPhone) Certified.
Inspected and guaranteed to have minimal cosmetic damage, which is not noticeable when the device is held at arms length.
Successfully passed a full diagnostic test which ensures like-new functionality and removal of any prior-user personal information.
Tested for battery health and guaranteed to have a minimum battery capacity of 80%.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars151 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
